mapper.update: UPDATE tty_po_worklog_content t set t.delete_flag = 1,t.modify_user = #{modifyUser},t.modify_date = #{modifyDate} where WORKLOG_ID = #{worklogId}

UPDATE tty_po_worklog_content
WORKLOG_ID = #{worklogId},
CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType},
SORT_NUM = #{sortNum},
CONTENT = #{content},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id}
